title: Looking to join a team
body:
Im a adc/top main but can play any lane to a high standard. Im Gold 3-4 my highest has been gold 2 promos. I main: {{champion:222}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:133}}  
Looking to play just about daily except monday and thursday for i work after school those days
Ive been playing since season 1 so im very experienced and i think its about time i  join a team.
Add me if you are keen or comment below
IGN: Quinnderella
